page.title: 02CHARLOTTE'S SATURDAYS
page.content: On Saturdays I wake up at 7.30 a.m.I get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast.For my breakfast I have Rice Pops,toast and marmalade and I have a drink of fresh orange.As I step out of the door to go to {St.Albans Market}a burst of sunlight comes through the door. I go by car to the Market and we park in the {Multi Storey Carpark}.I look around the Market and buy the things that I would like.They have wool stalls,sweet stalls,cheese stalls,material stalls and lots of other interesting stalls.Then we would go back to the{Multi Storey Carpark.} .Then we pay the man for how long we have been there and then we drive home. { }Once home I go out to play until 1.00 p.m.I come in for lunch and I have{Fish and Chips.}
